    • Uses of AbstractTarget in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller

      Methods in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller that return AbstractTarget 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractTarget ControllerFactory.createTargetController(AbstractWeapon weapon, org.json.JSONObject config)
      Creates the controller for a specific weapon target The required configuration fields are id and type, the other ones will receive default values if not specified in the JSON.
      AbstractTarget StandardControllerFactory.createTargetController(AbstractWeapon weapon, org.json.JSONObject config)
      Creates the controller for a specific weapon target The required configuration fields are id and targetMode, the other ones will receive default values if not specified in the JSON.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<AbstractTarget> TargetingEffect.getTargets()
      Returns a list with the targets of this effect, in their execution order.
      Methods in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.weapons.effects with parameters of type AbstractTarget 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TargetingEffect.appendTarget(AbstractTarget target)
      Appends a target to the end of the list of targets to execute.

    • Uses of AbstractTarget in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.weapons.targets

      Subclasses of AbstractTarget in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.weapons.targets 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PlayerTarget
      Represents a single player target in a TargetingEffect.
      class  RadiusTarget
      Represents a weapon target which assigns damage and marks to all the players in a certain radius from the shooter.
      class  RoomTarget
      Represents a weapon target which assigns damage and marks to the players in a single room.
      class  SingleSquareTarget
      Represents a target of TargetingEffect which stays on a single square.
      class  SquareTarget
      Represents a target of TargetingEffect where all the players in a square get the same damage and marks.
      class  VortexTarget
      Represents single player target of the vortex type.
